thumb.title: みょんちゃん魂魄妖夢とお爺様の魂魄妖忌、西行寺家御庭番 BGM 「広有射怪鳥事 ～ Till When?」のアレンジ
thumb.description: みょんちゃん魂魄妖夢とお爺様の魂魄妖忌が剣技、牙突のポーズで決まる！ 迫る東方Project人気投票にて魂魄妖夢と魂魄妖忌にて投票します！ Myonchan (Youmu Konpaku) and her grandpa (Youki Konpaku) striking their pose of Gatsotsu! I will vote for Youmu and Youki Konpaku in the coming Touhou Project popularity poll 2025! My illustration is posted on my pixiv page https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/133275382 BGM: https://commons.nicovideo.jp/works/nc184386 https://commons.nicovideo.jp/works/nc52765 Touhou project is produced by ZUN and Shanghai Alice Fantasy Band
